message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.HC. 

The paper deals with recommender systems, which are typically studied in the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The proposed method involves maximizing the utility of recommended items subject to diversity, which is a common problem in Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). Finally, the method is evaluated in online user studies, which falls under the Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) sub-category.
